title: New England Style Justice Chowder
description: It's time to clear the docket! Bailiff Jesse Thorn has the week off. Monte Belmonte and Joel Mann join Judge Hodgman to dispense New England Style Justice. Hosting gatherings with your spouse, silverware sorting, maple syrup, car navigation, and sleeping with the windows open during New England winters.
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Judge John Hodgman, MaximumFun.org)
